article_title: New study examines possible Va. health provider tax to increase U.S. funding
article_text:

og.description: Virginia’s refusal to expand its Medicaid program with money raised under the Affordable Care Act has some hospitals looking for a different source of federal funds — a tax on themselves.
og.title: New study examines possible Va. health provider tax to increase U.S. funding
